pkgmetadata.longdescription: Alaric---Providing a beautiful way to interact with MongoDB asynchronously in Python.---### Example usageA simplistic example, read more on the docs!```pythonfrom motor.motor_asyncio import AsyncIOMotorClientfrom alaric import Documentclient = AsyncIOMotorClient("Mongo connection url")database = client["my_database"]config_document = Document(database, "config")await config_document.insert({"_id": 1, "data": "hello world"})...data = await config_document.find({"_id": 1})```---#### Docs can be found [here](https://alaric.readthedocs.io/)---### SupportWant realtime help? Join the discord [here](https://discord.gg/BqPNSH2jPg).---### LicenseThis project is licensed under the MIT license---### FundingWant a feature added quickly?
